ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence

Interface SequencePath

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSequencePath, SequencePathCircular, SequencePathLinear

    public interface SequencePath
    Allows drawing of arbitrary shapes along the Sequence.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SequencePath.Orientation
      Defines the orientation of particular lines along the path, used for some effects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears this SequencePath.
      void closePath()
      Closes the path, draws line back to coords of last moveTo.
      void closePath(SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
      Closes the path, draws line back to coords of last moveTo.
      java.awt.Shape createFullBackboneShape(double topHeight, double bottomHeight, Location trueLocation)
      Creates a shape that stretches the full length of the backbone with the passed top/bottom values.
      BackboneShape createStrokedShape(java.awt.Stroke s)
      Returns the created shape with the passed stroke applied to it.
      BackboneShape getShape()
      Gets the shape described by this SequencePath.
      void lineTo(double base, Direction direction)
      Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates using the previous heightFromBackbone (or 0 if no previous heightFromBackbone).
      void lineTo(double base, Direction direction, SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
      Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates using the previous heightFromBackbone (or 0 if no previous heightFromBackbone).
      void lineTo(double base, double heightFromBackbone, Direction direction)
      Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates.
      void lineTo(double base, double heightFromBackbone, Direction direction, SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
      Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates.
      void lineTo(double base, double heightFromBackbone, double lengthFromBase, Direction direction)
      Defines a line (in terms of sequence coordinates) to the point defined by (base,heightFromBackbone) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).
      void lineTo(double base, double heightFromBackbone, double lengthFromBase, Direction direction, SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
      Defines a line (in terms of sequence coordinates) to the point defined by (base,heightFromBackbone) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).
      void moveTo(double base, double heightFromBackbone)
      Adds a point at the passed location.
      void moveTo(double base, double heightFromBackbone, double lengthFromBase)
      Move to the location defined by (base, heightFromBackbone) + (lengthFromBase, 0)

      Adds a point at the passed location.

      Defines a true line to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).

      Defines a true line to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).

    • Method Detail

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone)
        Adds a point at the passed location.
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone of this point.

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Adds a point at the passed location.
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone of this point.
        orientation - The orientation of the point we moved to on the overall shape.

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          double lengthFromBase)
        Move to the location defined by (base, heightFromBackbone) + (lengthFromBase, 0)
        Parameters:
        base - The base pair value to move to.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to move to.
        lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to move to.

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          double lengthFromBase,
          SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Move to the location defined by (base, heightFromBackbone) + (lengthFromBase, 0)
        Parameters:
        base - The base pair value to move to.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to move to.
        lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to move to.
        orientation - The orientation of the point we moved to on the overall shape.

      • lineTo

        void lineTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          Direction direction,
          SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates. The line will be straight in sequence coordinates, but may be curved in actual coordinates.
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone of this point.
        orientation - The orientation of the line.

      • lineTo

        void lineTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          Direction direction)
        Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates. The line will be straight in sequence coordinates, but may be curved in actual coordinates.
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone of this point.

      • realLineTo

        void realLineTo(double base,
              double heightFromBackbone,
              double lengthFromBase,
              SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Defines a true line to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).
        Parameters:
        base - The base pair value to draw to.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to draw to.
        lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
        orientation - The orientation of the line.

      • realLineTo

        void realLineTo(double base,
              double heightFromBackbone,
              double lengthFromBase)
        Defines a true line to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).
        Parameters:
        base - The base pair value to draw to.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to draw to.
        lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.

      • lineTo

        void lineTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          double lengthFromBase,
          Direction direction,
          SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Defines a line (in terms of sequence coordinates) to the point defined by (base,heightFromBackbone) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).
        Parameters:
        base - The base pair value to draw to.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to draw to.
        lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
        direction - The direction to draw the passed line.
        orientation - The orientation of the line.

      • lineTo

        void lineTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          double lengthFromBase,
          Direction direction)
        Defines a line (in terms of sequence coordinates) to the point defined by (base,heightFromBackbone) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).
        Parameters:
        base - The base pair value to draw to.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to draw to.
        lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
        direction - The direction to draw the passed line.

      • lineTo

        void lineTo(double base,
          Direction direction,
          SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates using the previous heightFromBackbone (or 0 if no previous heightFromBackbone).
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        direction - The direction to draw the passed line.
        orientation - The orientation of the line.

      • lineTo

        void lineTo(double base,
          Direction direction)
        Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates using the previous heightFromBackbone (or 0 if no previous heightFromBackbone).
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        direction - The direction to draw the passed line.

      • closePath

        void closePath()
        Closes the path, draws line back to coords of last moveTo.

      • closePath

        void closePath(SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
        Closes the path, draws line back to coords of last moveTo.
        Parameters:
        orientation - The orientation of the line used to close.

      • getShape

        BackboneShape getShape()
        Gets the shape described by this SequencePath.
        Returns:
        The shape described by this SequencePath.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears this SequencePath.

      • createStrokedShape

        BackboneShape createStrokedShape(java.awt.Stroke s)
        Returns the created shape with the passed stroke applied to it.
        Parameters:
        s - The stroke to apply
        Returns:
        The shape with the stroke s applied to it (if s is null, then returns same as getShape()).

      • createFullBackboneShape

        java.awt.Shape createFullBackboneShape(double topHeight,
                                     double bottomHeight,
                                     Location trueLocation)
        Creates a shape that stretches the full length of the backbone with the passed top/bottom values.
        Parameters:
        topHeight -
        bottomHeight -
        trueLocation -
        Returns:
        A shape that stretches the full length of the backbone.
